title: Miami-Dade County Courthouse Renovation and Expansion
description: Comprehensive renovation and expansion of the Miami-Dade County Courthouse including structural upgrades, HVAC systems, and accessibility improvements.

title: Orlando International Airport Terminal 3 Construction
description: Construction of new Terminal 3 at Orlando International Airport including baggage handling systems and retail space.

title: Tampa Bay Water Treatment Plant Upgrade
description: Major upgrade to water treatment facilities including new filtration systems and chemical treatment equipment.

title: Jacksonville Public Library System Modernization
description: Modernization of 8 branch libraries including technology upgrades, HVAC systems, and ADA compliance improvements.

title: Fort Lauderdale Beachfront Promenade Development
description: Development of beachfront promenade including boardwalk construction, landscaping, and recreational facilities.

title: Gainesville University Medical Center Expansion
description: Expansion of University of Florida Medical Center including new patient wings, surgical suites, and research facilities.

title: Sarasota Performing Arts Center Construction
description: Construction of new performing arts center with 1,200-seat theater, rehearsal spaces, and educational facilities.

title: Palm Beach County Emergency Operations Center
description: Construction of new emergency operations center with command facilities, communications systems, and backup power.

title: Tallahassee State Capitol Renovation
description: Comprehensive renovation of the Florida State Capitol building including structural upgrades, security systems, and accessibility improvements.

title: Daytona Beach International Speedway Infrastructure
description: Infrastructure improvements at Daytona International Speedway including parking facilities, utilities, and access roads.
